heading.smallTitle: Treasured by the royals. Envy of millions.
heading.title: We are still searching for the world's largest and most precious uncut diamond. Join us in our mission to find The Cullinan!
heading.description: Discover the story of this extraordinaire and come closer to owning it.

checkBox.checkBoxLabel: I've read and agree to the

list.text: Mistaken as an ordinary stone, the glistening gem was later revealed to be a 3106-carat rough diamond.
The diamond found its place in the royal heirloom and was presented to King Edward VII.
The Cullinan rose to fame forming nine other principal diamonds which are housed at the British Royal Collection.
